snippet.title: Keep The Lights On Trailer
snippet.description:
Keep the Lights On is an atmospheric horror game where you step in the shoes of Edmund Rosental, a private detective, who is tasked with investigating an old abbey and the mystery surrounding it. Will he be able to keep the lights on or will he succumb to the darkness?

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401500/Keep_the_Lights_On/?curator_clanid=4777282

Itch.io: https://light-the-lantern-studios.itch.io/keep-the-lights-on

CREDITS

Lead Designer, Level Designer, Lead Coder, Producer, Additional Writing
Teemu Nokkanen
Portfolio: https://teemunokkanen99.wixsite.com/teemunokkanen
Itch.io: https://light-the-lantern-studios.itch.io/

Lead Artist, Lead Animator, UX, UI, Designer, Additional Writing

Lead Writer & Narrative Designer, Lead Producer, Designer, Additional Art

Portfolio:https://tirep7.wixsite.com/petripiiroinen

Artist, Concept Art, Animator, Designer, Voice Actor
Joel Kumpulainen

Composer

Assistant Artist, Concept Art

Assistant UI Artist
Tiia Laaksonen
Portfolio: https://tiialaaksonen.wixsite.com/mysite
